s2.ptxt: Install a clean hose to the ventilation valve.

s3.ptxt: Blow air into the cylinder head side, and check that air passes through easily.

atten2.ptxt: Do not suck air through the valve. Petroleum substances inside the valve are hazardous to your health.

s3.ptxt: Blow air into the intake manifold side, and check that air passes through with difficulty.
If the result is not as specified, replace the ventilation valve sub-assembly.

s2.ptxt: Remove the clean hose from the ventilation valve.
